LanguageData.MealImprovedNutrientPaste.label: improved nutrient paste meal
LanguageData.MealImprovedNutrientPaste.description: An improved nutrient paste meal that tastes bland but not disgusting
LanguageData.MealFineNutrientPaste.label: fine nutrient paste meal
LanguageData.MealFineNutrientPaste.description: A nutrient paste meal that has been artificially flavored. Tastes pretty good actually!
LanguageData.MealPrisonerNutrientPaste.label: rotten nutrient paste
LanguageData.MealPrisonerNutrientPaste.description: A gross concotion of unknown ingredients. Because it is so processed it deteriorates very slowly and doesn't spoil.
LanguageData.MealChocoPaste.label: Chocolate paste meal
LanguageData.MealChocoPaste.description: A chocolate paste meal made of coco beans from the Chocolate Paste Dispenser.
